701463f-a.title: Bronx: Mohegan Avenue - Crotona Parkway
701463f-a.text:
Mohegan Ave. (right), north from its junction with Crotona Parkway.
On the extreme left are houses facing on Southern Boulevard, which runs
parallel to Crotona Parkway.
April 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
701463f-a.folder: Mohegan Avenue & Crotona Parkway, Bronx, NY
